definitions.definition: To approach each other; to get closer and closer.
labels: said of two or more entities
label_groups: said of two or more entities

definitions.definition: To have a ( finite , proper ) limit .
labels: said of a sequence or series
label_groups: said of a sequence or series

definitions.definition: To reach a stable end point.

main_definition: ( intransitive ) ( said of two or more entities ) To approach each other; to get closer and closer.
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive , mathematics ) ( said of a sequence or series ) To have a ( finite , proper ) limit .
( intransitive , computing ) ( said of an iterative process ) To reach a stable end point.
